result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for interacting with the Gecko terminal API to fetch pool data and trends, as well as defining data models for trading pool information.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to the Gecko terminal API and its data models within dedicated files.

internal/infras/geckoterminal/client.go.purpose: This file defines a client for interacting with a Gecko terminal API to fetch pool data and trends.

internal/infras/geckoterminal/models.go.purpose: Defines data models for handling trading pool information and time ranges in the geckoterminal package.
